title: FieldAnalysisRequestHandler; Missing Tokenizer- & Filter-Options
description:
Ryan mentioned in SOLR-2399 that the new analysis page is missing some important parameters – that's based on the fact that they are actually not included in the Output (sample for "ViewSonic") attached.

To see the difference, compare the current page with the new analysis-page.

maybe it's possible that anyone could included them there?

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: Not sure anymore why i've created two issues .. closing this on in favor of SOLR-2635
